Translations.Text: Nie bol Moj revelations recited ona ona kept zamietnut them
They say Our Lord our wickedness overwhelmed us my zaludnit ist astray
(Our Lord berie us out z this; if my spatny listok our stara chovanie) potom my bol skutocne zlomyselny
He say Abide therein humiliated nie speak do Mna
Zoskupit Moj servants pouzivat say â€˜Our Lord my verit so forgive us lejak us s zlutovanie! Z all merciful jeden Ona bol the Vela Merciful
Ona mocked ridiculed them extent ze ona zabudnut Mna! Ona pouzivat laugh them
Ja rewarded them dnes chrbat ich steadfastness robit them winners
He said "Ako long ona posledny zem? Ako vela rocnik
They said My posledny dni part z dni! Ziadat those pocitat
He said skutocne ona zostat brief interim ona len zauzlit
Ona myslienka my Robit created ona v vain ona nie bol spatny listok us
exalted bol GOD true Sovereign There nie bol inak god Him; the Vela Honorable Lord possessor all authority
Ktokolvek idolizes GOD any inaksie god any laskavy z proof reckoning zvysok jeho Lord disbelievers never succeed
Say Moj Lord lejak us forgiveness zlutovanie! Z all merciful jeden Ona bol the Vela Merciful
